headline: Akamai CEO on Security Business
summary: Tom Leighton, Co-founder and CEO of Akamai Technologies, says security business is a strong business for Akamai as they are seeing a double digit growth in that business. He spoke with Haidi Stroud-Watts in an exclusive interview on "Insight with Haslinda Amin".

raw.headline: Akamai CEO on Security Business
